attributes.action: Re-open the Blackwall Tunnel tidal flow to ease MAJOR congestion.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Re-opening the tidal flow will of course reduce travel time for many. The congestion that is caused also creates major co2 emissions which of course the govement is trying to reduce to help the enviroment. Also with the olympics approaching, this will cause further congestion as the blackwall tunnel will be a Major carriageway into the events.
